channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for AK
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for AK

item.title: Report X-2024120623
item.description:
Report X-2024120623

Identified by scraper @ 2024-12-13T15:15:09+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-12-04
  • City: ANCHORAGE
  • State: AK
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On December 4th a package that was sent by a beauty supply shop was discovered during the AM sort by having a slight odor. Further investigation showed that the package contained beauty supplies including three aerosol cans, UN1950 Aerosols, flammable, 2.1. The contents did not spill, and were placed in the DG Hold area pending further investigation.

item.title: Report X-2024120416
item.description:
Report X-2024120416

Identified by scraper @ 2024-12-09T12:25:35+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-11-29
  • City: ANCHORAGE
  • State: AK
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: ONE GROUND TO ALASKA PACKAGE HAD SHIPPED FROM COLORADO TO ALASKA WAS AT THE DESTINATION IN ALASKA WHEN THE DRIVER SMELLED A STRONG FUEL ODOR.THE DRIVER ALSO DISCOVERED THE PACKAGE HAD LEAKED IN THE DELIVERY TRUCK. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED ONE HONDA EU1000I PORTABLE INVERTER GENERATOR WITH FUEL IN THE TANK. THE FUEL WAS SLOSHING AROUND CAUSING THE GENERATOR TO LEAK FROM THE CLOSURE. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOX. THIS PACKAGE WAS SHIPPED FROM COLORADO USING UPS ACCOUNT NUMBER 50X763, THE UPS STORE, 3531 S LOGAN ST, ENGLEWOOD CO 80113-3700. PRIOR TO THE UNDECLARED DISCOVERY THE PACKAGE WAS FLOWN FROM ONT TO ANC.
